General.Name: G Capital Public Company Limited
General.Description: G Capital Public Company Limited operates as financial services company in Thailand. The company provides hire purchase financial service to various agricultural machineries, such as combine rice harvesting machine, corn harvester, agricultural drone, crawling rotavator, farm tractors, wooden loader, sugar cane loader, etc.; and refinancing services for new and used machinery, as well as unsecured loans including personal loan credit for farmers. It offers hire purchase financial services for individual and companies, which includes purchase of the catamaran speed business for tourism; and secured loans including mortgage, factoring, and sale with right of redemption for working capital, and business expansion. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
